definitions: the quality of being unpleasant or repulsive in appearance

examples.text: Helena gives a soliloquy comparing her ugliness to Hermia's beauty
the sheer ugliness of this architectural monstrosity

shortDefinitions: quality of being unpleasant or repulsive in appearance

definitions: unpleasantness of an immoral or violent nature

examples.text: a film bent on exposing the ugliness of prejudice
the futility and ugliness of war

shortDefinitions: unpleasantness of immoral or violent nature
